is a outback opal mining town in South Western
Access is by 60km of sealed road from the Bulloo Developmental Road (The Adventure Way) just outside of
.  A 23km unsealed 4wd track takes around the same time to traverse as the sealed road to
, but may provide a time saving if travelling to or from
You will need a car to get around town.

value: View to the end of the world from the bluff

directions=Follow the road towards the communications tower from the main bore
content=The bluff is a 50m elevation in remarkably flat country, around 4km out of town.  It gives a view of the country for miles around, and an appreciation for how flat and remote it all is.
content=You can take an underground opal mining tour.
content=Get a fossicking licence from the general store, and follow the signs to the fossicking fields.  Maybe strike it lucky!

of course.  Direct from the miner.  There are many opportunities for opal shopping in town.

The Yowah nut is the local opal.  Small rocks on the ground reveal the opal colouring when cut.  The local miners can see which of the rocks are likely to contain a nut.  You can get your own fossicking cut for a fee as well (you won't know if you've found a true nut until it is cut).

You can purchase them in the rough, or as fine jewellery, or in pretty much any state in between.
You can get food at the
(follow the pink signs into town).  Hamburgers, milkshakes, that sort of thing.
There is no pub, or bottle shop in Yowah.  The nearest beer is in
or 135 kilometres north at Toompine where the population is just 2, the publican and his wife.  On holidays much of Yowah's population can migrate to
There is a single caravan park in Yowah, with six cabins.
The closest alternative place to stay would be
There is Telstra 3G coverage in Yowah.  No other mobile networks are available.  There is a public phone.

If you have a four wheel drive, and you came in via the sealed road, perhaps you would like to return via the Black Gate Road.  Turn left off the main road just out of town, next to the dummy fireman.
